item.title: Tree has been vandalised, 6th August
item.description:

item.title: Overgrown hedge onto path DANGEROUS, 6th August
item.description:
The owner of this hedge has clearly not bothered to cut it back at all this summer. It is now dangerously encroaching over the pavement and as a consequence people are having to step into the busy Bellenden Road. It is also completely obscuring a road sign which is also very dangerous. Please can it be cut back. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79a, Choumert Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
